sentences.sContent: He’s only been in this job for nine months.
sentences.sCn: 他干这份工作才九个月。

sentences.sContent: We open at nine (= nine o’clock ).
Kay was taught by her mother till she was nine (= nine years old ).
sentences.sCn: 凯一直由她妈妈教到九岁。

phrases.pCn: n. [俚]九重天（想象中的天堂）；[俚]极乐心境；[俚]狂喜状态
[美口]全部；一切事物；从头至尾
